original_solution_mapping.L1: If four pugs can clean their house in 45 minutes, one pug will take 4*45 = <<4*45=180>>180 minutes.
original_solution_mapping.L2: Since one pug working alone takes 180 minutes to clean the house, fifteen pugs working together will be able to clean their house in 180/15 = <<180/15=12>>12 minutes

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 3290.
    Returns: the time in minutes for 15 pugs to clean the house.
    """
    # L1
    initial_pugs = 4 # four pugs
    initial_time_minutes = 45 # 45 minutes
    time_for_one_pug = initial_pugs * initial_time_minutes

    # L2
    target_pugs = 15 # 15 pugs
    time_for_target_pugs = time_for_one_pug / target_pugs

    # FA
    answer = time_for_target_pugs
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: If {initial_pugs} pugs can clean their house in {initial_time_minutes} minutes, one pug will take {initial_pugs}*{initial_time_minutes} = <<{initial_pugs}*{initial_time_minutes}={time_for_one_pug}>>{time_for_one_pug} minutes.

Since one pug working alone takes {time_for_one_pug} minutes to clean the house, fifteen pugs working together will be able to clean their house in {time_for_one_pug}/{target_pugs} = <<{time_for_one_pug}/{target_pugs}={time_for_target_pugs}>>{time_for_target_pugs} minutes

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: If 4 pugs can clean their house in 45 minutes, one pug will take 4*45 = <<4*45=180>>180 minutes.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: Since one pug working alone takes 180 minutes to clean the house, fifteen pugs working together will be able to clean their house in 180/45 = <<180/45=4>>4 minutes

explanation: Input misrepresentation. The value for 'initial_time_minutes' (45) was used instead of 'target_pugs' (15).
